meaningMnemonic: If you look at this radical, it looks like the bottom part of a <radical>sword</radical>—the handle, more specifically. This radical also looks a lot like the power radical (力), so don't get them confused. It's missing the little nubbin at the top, because 90% of the power comes from the sword to cut your enemies down (which is why the sword radical is 90% of the power radical).
